subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Frank Carulli, the odds maker for Pimlico Race Course, made Street Sense the 7-5 favorite in the morning line for the 132nd running of the Preakness Stakes.
snippet: Frank Carulli, the odds maker for Pimlico Race Course, made Street Sense the 7-5 favorite in the morning line for the 132nd running of the Preakness Stakes.
